input.sentences: this japanese building holds a very unique garden in it .
the building stands tall as it is a few stories high .
behind it leads the way to an outside garden .
a path displays a very interesting walkway for people .
with all sorts of statues to look at while walking .
output.sentences: I could see the great architechure from a distance and wanted to get closer to this beautiful building.
When I arrived near the five story building too beautiful for words I wondered how it was built.
Later on I saw a painting of the magnificant building I visited and it did not do justice to the real thinng.
I viewed so pictures painted of the Orient and thought the paint used was dull and did not do justice to the real thing.
I wondered about a second painting of the same art work with a view of it in the back ground behind a statue of a large gurard dog.
